pages.text: Summon an impenetrable dome which can only be passed through by sneaking players. $(br2)A bound or blooded waystone may be used to target a different position. $(br2)Requires an additional 4 power per tick.

Summon an impenetrable dome which can only be passed through by sneaking players. $(br2)A bound or blooded waystone may be used to target a different position.  $(br2)Requires an additional 6 power per tick.
Summon an impenetrable dome which cannot be passed through by anything for 60 seconds. $(br2)A bound or blooded waystone may be used to target a different position.
